about_the_game:
Welcome to "PsychShift" - A Mind-Altering FPS Adventure!



Dive into the heart of the NeuroHive, a mysterious laboratory where reality twists, and your mind is your most potent weapon. "PsychShift" is an FPS experience that combines innovative mechanics with a gripping narrative, challenging you to navigate through the labyrinthine corridors of the NeuroHive.

Key Mechanics:

1. Mindswap:
Master the art of Mindswap, a groundbreaking ability that allows you to switch places with enemies. Swap health, ammo, and location on the fly to outmaneuver your adversaries and conquer the challenges that lie ahead.

2. Parkour:
Embrace the freedom of movement with dynamic Parkour elements. Wall run in a state of flow and stick to walls in a static state, allowing you to traverse the NeuroHive with unparalleled agility. Your acrobatic prowess becomes a vital asset in your quest for escape.

3. NeuroNetwork:
Manipulate time with the NeuroNetwork, slowing it down to enhance your combat finesse. Execute lightning-fast Mindswaps and utilize the push-pull mechanic with precision, creating a symphony of destruction as you navigate the NeuroHive.

4. Push Pull Objects:
Shape your environment with the unique Push-Pull mechanic. Pull ledges into existence or push objects to create cover, adding a strategic layer to the fast-paced FPS action. Adapt the NeuroHive to your advantage, turning the tables on your enemies.

5. Shooting:
Engage in intense firefights with a diverse arsenal of weapons. Perfect your marksmanship skills as you face off against enemies in the ever-shifting NeuroHive. Combine your shooting abilities with the game's unique mechanics for a truly immersive FPS experience.

Story:
As a blank slate, you wake up in the NeuroHive, driven by an instinctual need to escape. A mysterious guiding voice urges you forward as you navigate through the labyrinth, encountering the Warden, a formidable guardian standing between you and freedom. Your journey is a relentless climb through the layers of the NeuroHive, with each level bringing new challenges and revelations.

Prepare for a mind-bending FPS experience! "PsychShift" will push your reflexes, strategic thinking, and parkour skills to the limit. Unravel the mysteries of the NeuroHive, and let the adrenaline-fueled action immerse you in a world where every shot counts. Your escape from the NeuroHive begins now!

name: PsychShift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Mac OSX Sierra (10.13.6+)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core Processor, 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: PsychShift is a unique take on the fast and frenetic First-Person Shooter/Parkour formula. With one core mechanic at its center, the ability to instantaneously swap minds with nearly any enemy you choose. Taking on both their current position and also their characteristics.
